<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Round up the size to a multiple of the alignment.  If the function has</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the frame pointer is eliminated, all frame offsets will be relative to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SP not FP. Align to MaxAlign so this works.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  StackAlign = std::max(StackAlign, MaxAlign);</span></CodeLine>
